author: Simon Difford
description: Delicate sage and a hint of apple, dried with vermouth and fortified with vodka.
name: Sage Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly MUDDLE (just to bruise) sage in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
